message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CY 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it deals with natural language processing and classification of text. It may also belong to cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) as it deals with social media platforms like Twitter and Reddit. The use of BERT architecture suggests it may also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval) as BERT is a deep learning model used for various NLP tasks. Finally, it may belong to cs.CY (Computers and Society) as it deals with the issue of rumour veracity and support on social media platforms.
